Package uo.ri.cws.application.repository

Interface Repository<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Subinterfaces:
ChargeRepository, ClientRepository, InterventionRepository, InvoiceRepository, MechanicRepository, OrderRepository, PaymentMeanRepository, ProviderRepository, SparePartRepository, SupplyRepository, VehicleRepository, VehicleTypeRepository, WorkOrderRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientJpaRepository, InterventionJpaRepository, InvoiceJpaRepository, MechanicJpaRepository, OrderJpaRepository, PaymentMeanJpaRepository, ProviderJpaRepository, SparePartJpaRepository, SupplyJpaRepository, VehicleJpaRepository, VehicleTypeJpaRepository, WorkOrderJpaRepository
public interface Repository<T>
Common interface for a repository that follows the Collection metaphor, in the same way as any Collection in Java (List, Set, etc). You only put and remove objects (references indeed), thus there is no update method. That is an important difference with the TDG/DAO pattern.
